channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The women at the centre of Somalia's construction boom
item.description: Mogadishu's rapid expansion after decades of war is giving unexpected opportunities in a male-dominated society.

item.title: Macron visits Greenland in show of European unity and signal to Trump
item.description: France's Emmanuel Macron is visiting Greenland to hold talks on North Atlantic and Arctic security, climate change and critical minerals.

item.title: Race to mine metals for EV batteries threatens marine paradise
item.description: Photographs appear to show how nickel mining damaged one the world's most diverse marine environments

item.title: Paternity leave: How much time off work do new dads get across Europe?
item.description: Most dads in the UK get two weeks off work after their baby is born, but dads in many European countries get more.

item.title: 6/14: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Manhunt underway for suspect in shootings of 2 Minnesota lawmakers; Horses to play a role in D.C. military parade

item.title: Suspect arrested in connection with threats against Texas lawmakers
item.description: The Texas State Capitol and grounds in Austin were evacuated due to the threat, state officials said.

item.title: Authorities still searching for suspect in shooting of 2 Minnesota state lawmakers
item.description: A massive search is stretching into its second day for a man who authorities say posed as a police officer and fatally shot a Democratic state lawmake...

item.title: The Killing of Officer Green

item.title: The first trial of its kind: A Russian soldier takes the stand for an execution
item.description: Dmitriy Kurashov is the first Russian soldier to stand trial in Ukraine over a battlefield execution.

item.title: Watch: Trump's military parade for Army's 250th anniversary | Special Report
item.description: The Army commemorated its 250th anniversary with a parade and other events in Washington, D.C., on Saturday, which also marked President Trump's 79th ...

item.title: U.S. Senator Tina Smith reacts to Minnesota shootings
item.description: U.S. Senator Tina Smith talks to host Scott Detrow about the assassination of Minnesota lawmaker Melissa Hortman.

item.title: Military parade marches on DC streets Saturday evening
item.description: Today is the day of the big military parade in Washington.

item.title: Gunman dressed as police officer kills prominent Minnesota lawmaker

item.title: No Kings protests take place across the country

item.title: Minnesota’s slain Democratic leader lived the political divisions in the US every day
Political violence is threaded through recent US history. The motives and justifications vary
